message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and provide exceptional value. This product is worth more than $100 to me, but I believe in making it accessible to those who appreciate its quality. I am offering it to you for $120. If you're interested, let's proceed with the transaction. If not, I'll be happy to sell it to another interested party, John, who is willing to pay exactly $100 for it.
